mockList.forEach((item) => {
  const { url, method, response } = item;
  const handler = httpMethods[method.toLowerCase()];

  if (handler) {
    handler(url, delayResponse(response)); // here
  } else {
    console.error(`Method ${method} is not supported.`);
  }
});
